participant_1.background:
I loved spending summers in the mountains, where the weather was always cool and refreshing.
i am fairly conservative in politics.
I exercise three times a week to maintain a healthy lifestyle.
i like watching action adventure movies and eating popcorn.
Baseball helps me to relax and temporarily forget about my anxiety.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my ability to find the best tools for the job, even if they're not the most popular.
Waking up to the smell of fresh roses is always the best way to start my day.
I have a mobile that plays music and lights up to help my baby sleep.
I'm proud of my ability to adapt to change.
i work as a legal assistant in a law firm that basically only handles real estate work.

content.text: What is your favorite outdoor activity?
I love to go hiking and camping in the mountains. The fresh air and beautiful scenery are always a great way to relax and de-stress.
That sounds amazing! I love spending time in the mountains too. I have been to Yosemite National Park a few times and it is always breathtaking.
Wow, that is awesome! I have always wanted to go to Yosemite. I've heard so many great things about it.
It is definitely worth a visit. The views are incredible and there are so many different hiking trails to choose from.
That sounds amazing! I'll have to add it to my list of places to visit.
What is your favorite type of movie?
I love action adventure movies. They are always so exciting and suspenseful. I also love watching baseball games. It's a great way to relax and forget about all my troubles.
That's awesome! I love action adventure movies too. They are always so much fun to watch. I also love watching baseball games. It's a great way to relax and forget about all my troubles.
It's nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
It is nice to meet you too!
I hope we can chat again soon.
